opendap.olfs
Class BesAPI

java.lang.Object
  opendap.olfs.BesAPI

public class BesAPI
extends java.lang.Object

BES transaction code and client pool management are contained in this class. All of the methods are static, but the class is not stateless, as it maintains an intenral pool of client connections to the BES. Since all of the BES transaction code for the OLFS is wrapped in this class, future optimizations should be easier... (right?)

Constructor Detail

BesAPI

public BesAPI()
Method Detail

shutdownBES

public static void shutdownBES()
This method is meant to be called at program exit. It waits until all clients are checked into the pool and then gracefully shuts down each client's connection to the BES.

configure

public static boolean configure(java.lang.String host,
                                int port,
                                int maxClients)
Configures the BES. The BES may configured ONCE. Subsequent calls to configure() will be ignored.

Parameters:
host - The host name/ip of the BES
port - The port on which the BES is listening
maxClients - The maximum number of concurrent client connections that will be allowed to the BES.
Returns:
False if configure() mas been called previously, True otherwise.

configure

public static boolean configure(BESConfig bc)
Configures the BES using the passed BESConfig object. The BES may configured ONCE. Subsequent calls to configure() will be ignored.

Parameters:
bc -
Returns:
False if configure() mas been called previously, True otherwise.

isConfigured

public static boolean isConfigured()
Returns:
True is the BES had been configured. False otherwise.

getDap2DataStream

public static java.io.InputStream getDap2DataStream(java.lang.String dataSource,
                                                    java.lang.String constraintExpression)
                                             throws BadConfigurationException,
                                                    PPTException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
Returns an InputStream that holds an OPeNDAP DAP2 data for the requested dataSource. The DDS header is stripped, so the InputStream holds ONLY the XDR encoded binary data.

Parameters:
dataSource - The requested DataSource
constraintExpression -
Throws:
BadConfigurationException
PPTException
java.io.IOException
